value.title: Learn Starcraft - Protoss Beginner Guide #1 (Updated Patch 4.0 FREE TO PLAY)
value.excerpt: How to command the incredibly strong forces of the protoss and cover weaknesses against the other inferior races. Updated for patch 4.0! This guide is not intended for COMPLETELY new players, but those who have played several games/campaign missions and grasp the very basics.
